name: 侠隐行录：困境疑云Wuxia archive: Crisis escape
description: Wuxia archive: Crisis escape is a text adventure puzzle game. The player will play a knight who is trapped in an unknown dungeon, get clues with other trapped characters, use the props in the scene to solve the puzzle and get out of danger.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7 Processor: AMD Athlon x2 250 Memory: 800 MB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 3450 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows7 Processor: AMD Athlon x2 250 Memory: 800 MB RAM Graphics: Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
